java/liquibase/database/sql/CreateViewStatement.java

00001 package liquibase.database.sql;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.*;
00004 import liquibase.exception.StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException;
00005 
00006 public class CreateViewStatement implements SqlStatement {
00007 
00008     private String schemaName;
00009     private String viewName;
00010     private String selectQuery;
00011     private boolean replaceIfExists;
00012 
00013     public CreateViewStatement(String schemaName, String viewName, String selectQuery, boolean replaceIfExists) {
00014         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00015         this.viewName = viewName;
00016         this.selectQuery = selectQuery;
00017         this.replaceIfExists = replaceIfExists;
00018     }
00019 
00020     public String getSchemaName() {
00021         return schemaName;
00022     }
00023 
00024     public String getViewName() {
00025         return viewName;
00026     }
00027 
00028     public String getSelectQuery() {
00029         return selectQuery;
00030     }
00031 
00032     public boolean isReplaceIfExists() {
00033         return replaceIfExists;
00034     }
00035 
00036     public String getSqlStatement(Database database) throws StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException {
00037         String createClause;
00038         if (database instanceof HsqlDatabase
00039                 || database instanceof DB2Database
00040                 || database instanceof CacheDatabase
00041                 || database instanceof MSSQLDatabase
00042                 || database instanceof DerbyDatabase) {
00043             if (replaceIfExists) {
00044                 throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException("replaceIfExists not supported", this, database);
00045             }
00046         }
00047         
00048 
00049         if (database instanceof FirebirdDatabase) {
00050             if (replaceIfExists) {
00051                 createClause = "RECREATE VIEW";
00052             } else {
00053                 createClause = "RECREATE VIEW";
00054             }
00055         } else {
00056             createClause = "CREATE " + (replaceIfExists ? "OR REPLACE " : "") + "VIEW";
00057         }
00058 
00059         return createClause + " " + database.escapeViewName(getSchemaName(), getViewName()) + " AS " + getSelectQuery();
00060     }
00061 
00062     public String getEndDelimiter(Database database) {
00063         return ";";
00064     }
00065 
00066     public boolean supportsDatabase(Database database) {
00067         return true;
00068     }
00069 }
